We have prepared a special offer for this forum users - **20% discount** for the first month of use vds. Just enter the "welcome-vps" promocode during the order and get a discount.

Moreover, ordering our services you participate in a unique loyalty program for our loyal customers - the longer you use our services and the more you order the less you pay. More information here [https://en.friendhosting.net/loyalnost.php](https://en.friendhosting.net/loyalnost.php)
